ComicInfo.Title: God Willing; Fritz and Pipo, Sittin' in a Tree...; But the Little Girls Understand; Of Two Minds; Pipo's Burden; La Luba; Burning for You
ComicInfo.Summary:
Venus, Hector and Petra chat with Ofelia in her office, who later suffers a heart attack while working on her book.
Fritz breaks up with Sergio reluctantly and Pipo breaks up with Igor
After making love, silent Khamo apparently knows who Luba cheated with and lets her know about it.
Fortunato's dreamlike liaisons with Guadalupe, Maricela and Ofelia.
Behind the scenes with family at Petra's first, and as it turns out, only boxing match.
Maricela comes across Khamo in the street.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:01:37. [Issue ID 691731]
